page.title: 10FOURFIELD'S SCHOOL GALA 1985
page.content: On Sunday June 9th the 1985 gala was opened by Mr.Alec Chater and Miss Fourfield's Jane Craft.These were the stalls :-Barbecue,Bean board,Beer tent,Book stall,Bottle stall,Bran tubs,Bric_a_brac,Cake stall,Cake raffle,Candy floss,Card stall,Coin bath,Doll raffle,Fancy dress,Fire service,Flower stall,Handy crafts,Hooplah,Teas,'Pop'Crisps,Ice cream,Insurance,Knock the lady out of the bed,Mary Ann toys,Nail game,Paint game,Pilgrim bow_men,Police display and Duck the teacher!to name but a few.The children of the school gave displays of Gymnastics and Popmobility and a Football tournamnent was held. Worzel Gummidge from PETERBOROUGH collected money(he is a character from television). Some lady {Morris Dancers}performed as did a childrens' dance group from Boston.
